extendedInfo.description: * Calorie counter to track food & exercise* Nutrition information for 80,000 items and 300 restaurants* Internet connection not needed (used only for charts)* Large food database* No web signup needed * Customize with your own foods and exercises* Flexible serving sizes* Favorite lists for fast access

reviews.comment: Best calorie app. But need backup/restore on/from memory card and BMI calculator, now app asking only my weight...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t like it...
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the handheld Calorie Smart I purchased from their web page several years ago. This app is not near as user friendly. One thing (important) is missing. Custom meals. I don\'t like the idea I need to input all the individual foods into the app for a full meal I eat regularly. Also, just a bit harder to maneuver and not near as many features as the Calorie Smart. Would not recommend, unless it was a free app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this program is very poor quality nice graphics the database is very poorly organized run away
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It sucks. Calorie counter is way better and has way more restaurants on it and options to add things. Oh yeah... And it\'s free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It would be awesome if it would calculate daily intake based on a goal like loseit! for iPhone I bumped my rating up because the food search rocks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the best calorie app available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Do not buy!! It didn\'t have all the foods Iate nor did it have just regular veggies to pick from. Also did not refund my money like it said it would
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The biggest waste of money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For what I\'ve seen I like, although it only offers a partial menu for some of my favorite resturants. They should make them complete.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Food database isnt bad but graphics kinda suck and not a fan of how the app is organized and how the menus r set up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not worth the money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice UI but doesn\'t do anything the free do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, simple and it works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok. Hard to navigate around. Lacks organization of favorites and water intake. Like the charts. Still using sparkpeople and using online chart.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thing couldn\'t find beans or cheese. Then kept kicking me out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing the font size issue. Great app easy to use!! I would suggest expanding the food list with user provided content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Application is ok, but when I change portion size it doesn\'t save this info. Also, it would be nice to have larger icons and graphic representation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exactly what I needed. You can add custom foods. Makes charts for percentages of fats,protein,carbs...awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wonderful app! Works well on my g1 phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this program but had t uninstall bc it takes up 12MB of internal memory after install. Please fix the size issue. Waiting to hear back from dev
reviews.author: A Google User
